name: Mysterious Floating Stones Within the Defiled Chambers...

imgDesc.text: The mysterious floating stones within the Defiled Chambers can only <color=#ffe14b>be seen by a Pari like Sorush</color> . <color=#ffe14b>Hold her Interact skill</color> to cause her to stop. She can cause these <color=#ffe14b>floating stones to appear</color> ...
